text: Highly recommended place for French food. Fresh baked bread was one of the best tasted. Ordered the 3 course set lunch was such great value. Got the French onion soup for appetiser. Felt like it was a little too watery but taste was decent. Cheeseburger and fries were well cooked. The pine nut tart had the right texture and was paired with light cream which wasn‚Äôt too sweet. Would recommend!

We heard about the 1 for 1 deal online and decided to check it out. The food was ok. The atmosphere was non existent. It doesn‚Äôt feel like a restaurant or even a French one. Their food is not cheap obviously.

Beautiful french steak restaurant in the area. Great steaks and entrees. Free easy parking makes this a must visit if you are visiting the area.
